# Project aims
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<span style="font-size: 30px; text-align: left;">1. Where are the four cardinal points located according to climatic data ?</span>

<span style="font-size: 30px; text-align: left;">2. Where do the French really place the "south of France" ?</span>

<span style="font-size: 30px; text-align: left;">3. Does this perception vary depending on their geographical origin or current place of residence ?</span>

<span style="font-size: 30px; text-align: left;">4. Is there a connection between perceived sensitivity to cold and the location of the south as identified by respondents ?</span>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>

# Materials and methods
<br>
<br>
<span style="font-size: 30px; text-align: left;">Survey with different parameters :</span>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<span style="font-size: 30px; text-align: left;">1. Childhood city and current city of residence.</span>

<span style="font-size: 30px; text-align: left;">2. Personal view of the boundaries of the south, north, east, and west on a map.</span>

<span style="font-size: 30px; text-align: left;">3. Sensitivity to cold (on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 means "not sensitive to cold" and 5 means "very sensitive to cold").</span>
